Mystic Mimi Collection
Bringing NFTs to life through Manga!

Story

Isekai (異世界)

How did Mimi get lost on the Solana blockchain? It all started when a group of storytellers and designers were just about to finish their anime series, with Mimi as the main character. When creating the series, Mimi was always mysterious and mercurial, as if she has a mind of her own.

It was late one evening, when the artists had finished their final scene. After letting the paint dry overnight, they returned to final the project complete; with one exception. Mimi had disappeared from all of the scenes. Had she been banished by an enemy? Had she run away in search of a better life? Was she looking for a lover, a friend or a conquest?

The reason Mimi transported to the Solana blockchain is not understood, but what is clear is that she has picked up special powers. She must now learn to both survive in her new environment and also control her new found powers!

Powers

In the confusion of leaping onto the Solana network, Mimi acquired three powers. With your help, she must now learn how to master these powers.

Each NFT has one of these specific powers which have been inspired by the greatest anime series of all time! These are denoted by the background colour.

HAKI (覇気)

NEN (ネン)

SHARINGAN (写輪眼)

Minting - Coming Soon!

Check out our Social Media for more details or explore our collection.

Roadmap

Find out what is beyond the horizon for the Mystic Mimi Collection.

Phase I - Join the Community

Mimi transports to the Solana network in early 2022. Join our Discord server to be a part of the community and meet other anime and NFT enthusiasts!

Phase II - Launch Offering

Every NFT holder will receive a free background. They can merge these with Mimi to give her a home on the Metaverse.

Phase III - Voting Rights

All NFT holders will have voting rights on who Mimi meets in the Metaverse. Will it be a friend, enemy, lover or magical creature? They will be launched on the Solana network.

We will build an anime series on the blockchain through voting rights, fan art and professional artists. We will have this series professionally published and sent to the holder of every New World Explorer NFT.

Phase IV - Hangouts

We will acquire land on the Solana Metaverse to bring together the community, create a space for anime artistic expression, hangouts, and New World Explorers business meetings. We will enable people to take the avatar of the NFT they own.

FAQs

Get all the answers to your Frequently Asked Questions here.

Official launch plans have not yet been announced. Follow us on Twitter or join our Discord to stay up to date with details on our official launch.

If you hold a New World Explorer NFT, you will be rewarded at zero cost! We are planning to release backgrounds for Mimi approximately 6 weeks after initial launch. At the moment, everyone will be able to claim a free background on our website. If you want a different background, simply trade or sell yours on the secondary marketplace.
We will then allow you to merge the two NFTs to give Mimi a home on the blockchain!

Whitelist is available for members of our Discord server. We will reward active members who contribute to making our community feel inclusive and enjoyable with whitelist spots. This will reserve people the ability to mint our NFTs early.

Solana is a decentralized blockchain built to enable scalable and user-friendly transactions. 3 reasons why we think Solana is awesome;
1. Low gas fees! Solana's scalability ensures transactions remain less than $0.01 for both developers and users. The average cost per transaction is $0.00025!
2. All about speed! Solana has a 400 millisecond block times and no cencorship, meaning that transactions will never be stopped and will always happen instantly (almost)!
3. Carbon neutral! The Solana Foundation recently announced that the blockchain is carbon neutral, thanks to carbon offsets.
This is why we think Solana will be the most dominant cryptocurrency and blockchain!

The Metaverse is the future incarnation of the internet. It allows users to live, work and socialise online via virtual reality. The New World Explorer will act as your art, entertainment, social community and business project!

Mystic Mimi 2022

HAKI (覇気)

Haki is a power which was introduced by One Piece and allows Mimi to leverage her spiritual energy to manifest all kinds of effects.

Return

NEN (ネン)

Nen is a power that first appeared in Hunter x Hunter and allows Mimi to use and manipulate her life energy, known as her aura (オーラ).

Return

Sharingan (写輪眼)

Sharingan is a power which first appeared in Naruto and offers the ability to observe and replicate and any technique she witnesses. However, abusing this power comes at a cost...

Return
